trans-unit.source: Here you can manage your OpenAI assistants. Create and configure assistants that will use your uploaded files as knowledge base.
trans-unit.target: Here you can manage your OpenAI assistants. Create and configure assistants that will use your uploaded files as knowledge base.

trans-unit.source: Enter a name for your OpenAI assistant.
trans-unit.target: Enter a name for your OpenAI assistant.

trans-unit.source: Enter a description for your OpenAI assistant.
trans-unit.target: Enter a description for your OpenAI assistant.

trans-unit.source: Select the OpenAI model to use for this assistant. All available models are shown. Model compatibility is validated when you save.
trans-unit.target: Select the OpenAI model to use for this assistant. All available models are shown. Model compatibility is validated when you save.

trans-unit.source: Enter a custom OpenAI model name (e.g., gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4-turbo-preview). Only use this if you select "Enter Custom Model" above.
trans-unit.target: Enter a custom OpenAI model name (e.g., gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4-turbo-preview). Only use this if you select "Enter Custom Model" above.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of tokens to generate in responses.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of tokens to generate in responses.

trans-unit.source: Controls randomness in responses (0.0 = deterministic, 2.0 = very random).
trans-unit.target: Controls randomness in responses (0.0 = deterministic, 2.0 = very random).

trans-unit.source: Controls diversity via nucleus sampling (0.0 = focused, 1.0 = diverse).
trans-unit.target: Controls diversity via nucleus sampling (0.0 = focused, 1.0 = diverse).

trans-unit.source: Enter system instructions for your OpenAI assistant.
trans-unit.target: Enter system instructions for your OpenAI assistant.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of this assistant in OpenAI (automatically generated).
trans-unit.target: The unique identifier of this assistant in OpenAI (automatically generated).

trans-unit.source: The current status of this assistant in OpenAI.
trans-unit.target: The current status of this assistant in OpenAI.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this assistant? This will also remove it from OpenAI.
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete this assistant? This will also remove it from OpenAI.

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the OpenAI Assistant screen.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to the OpenAI Assistant screen.

trans-unit.source: Here you can create and manage your OpenAI assistant.
trans-unit.target: Here you can create and manage your OpenAI assistant.
Model Selection Tips (in the 'create assistant screen')

trans-unit.source: All Models: All available models from your OpenAI account are shown
trans-unit.target: All Models: All available models from your OpenAI account are shown

trans-unit.source: Custom Models: Select "Enter Custom Model" to use any OpenAI model
trans-unit.target: Custom Models: Select "Enter Custom Model" to use any OpenAI model

trans-unit.source: Model Validation: Model compatibility is checked when you save the assistant
trans-unit.target: Model Validation: For technical reasons the model compatibility is only checked when you save the assistant.

trans-unit.source: View all available models on OpenAI Platform
trans-unit.target: View all available models on OpenAI Platform

trans-unit.source: Please enter a custom model name when selecting manual override.
trans-unit.target: Please enter a custom model name when selecting manual override.

trans-unit.source: Please select a model or enter a custom model name.
trans-unit.target: Please select a model or enter a custom model name.

trans-unit.source: The selected model "%s" is not compatible with OpenAI Assistants API. Please select a compatible model from the list.
trans-unit.target: The selected model "%s" is not compatible with OpenAI Assistants API. Please select a different model from the list.

trans-unit.source: Only one assistant is allowed per configuration. If an assistant already exists for this configuration, you will be redirected to edit it.
trans-unit.target: Only one assistant is allowed per configuration. If an assistant already exists for this configuration, you will be redirected to edit it.

trans-unit.source: Only one assistant is allowed per configuration. You are being redirected to the existing assistant.
trans-unit.target: Only one assistant is allowed per configuration. You are being redirected to the existing assistant.
